import React,{useRef} from 'react'; import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import {useReactToPrint} from "react-to-print"; export default function Register() { const location=useLocation(); const componentPdf=useRef(); const getPdf=useReactToPrint({ content:()=>componentPdf.current, documentTitle:"{location.state.fname}", onAfterPrint:()=>alert("Data Saved in PDF") }); return(
